page.title: 02The Mayor of Waverley
page.content: The{Mayor of Waverley}lives in Beam Hollow,Hale.He is the second Mayor of Waverley,as Waverley became a Borough and was granted a charter in 1984. He will keep the office for one year. During that time he will attend many important functions, including a {Garden Party}at{Buckingham Palace}in July. This year's Mayor is the first one to wear the specially made scarlet and black ankle length robe which is edged with musquash fur.It was presented this year as a gift to the Council and will be used by each succeeding Mayor. On his head he wears a two cornered hat. Most important he has a chain of office which has an enamelled medallion. It was made by the Crown Jewellers and is kept in a beautiful blue leather box, when not being worn.
